Text: Awesome, great album, a lot better than "Hell Chose Me" :) Thanks a lot!
Fucking love Carnifex, I think im going to buy it too, just to give them my money!

I encourage everyone to purchase albums by artists you want to support at your local record store [Hot Topic, Best Buy etc.].

Metal artists barely make anything off album sales, but it gets them on better tours and makes it more likely for them to come to your area! Support your local scene as well, get off your ass and go to local metal shows!
